source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_00<tab>There once was a dwarf named Ronitt
A boy with a bee in his bonnet.
He had agreed to a bet
He would come to regret,
Unless, of course, he actually won it.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>Règle spéciale<var 1D /var>:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

Ronitt a l'air exténué.

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_01<tab>The wager with Chief Xamott has prompted several Tholls to return to Tomra for fear of banishment in the event that Ronitt fails. He must produce five Rolling Tankards by the designated day, which is becoming increasingly unlikely as his workforce diminishes. He decides to take a stroll, ostensibly to clear his head, but through a rather obvious attempt at reverse psychology, he strongly implies that he wants you to follow him.

target:

L'heure tourne, et la situation se corse pour Ronitt, qui voit plusieurs de ses camarades lui faire faux bond. Plutôt que de se tourmenter inutilement, l'adolescent a préféré aller se rafraîchir les idées à Foulebourbe. Rejoignez-le et tentez de le rassurer.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_02<tab>Ronitt's plan to lure you away from the Anvil has worked, and he can now air his concerns without the other dwarves overhearing. He reveals that he is finding the burden of responsibility too much to bear, and turns to you for advice. Your words of wisdom soon lift his spirits, but it is the surprise arrival of Regitt, Karutt, and Ronitt's dwarven relations protocol automaton, the Megasonic Frogboy, that make the biggest difference. While his friends offer their support, the Frogboy provides Ronitt with a hint as to how they might turn their fortunes around.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_02<tab>Ronitt vous a fait part de ses doutes, mais aussi de sa détermination. L'arrivée de Gamin tonitruant, de Regitt et de Karutt, tous les trois venus lui réaffirmer leur soutien, a achevé de lui mettre du baume au cœur. Votre con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion semble même lui avoir inspiré une solution inédite... Rentrez au Garage Watts avec toute la bande, et parlez à Ronitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_03<tab>Back at Watts's Anvil, you are met by Ozogg, who had briefly disappeared in order to round up acquaintances of Ronitt's to assist with producing the tanks. Ronitt also has plans of his own, though he will wait until all of the pieces of the puzzle are in place before revealing exactly what those plans might be.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_03<tab>Ozogg, qui s'était absentée on ne sait trop où, est finalement revenue au Garage Watts... accompagnée de renforts, en la personne de Lorathia, Sai-Lewq et Eueliss<var 1D /var>! Vous voilà désormais un peu plus nombreux pour mettre en œuvre le plan de la dernière chance de Ronitt. Reparlez-lui pour en connaître la teneur.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_04<tab>You are presented with an opportunity to flex your crafting muscles once more. Ronitt asks you to produce yet another crate of essential supplies while he and his comrades take care of the rest.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_04<tab>Ronitt vous a expliqué qu'il comptait s'appuyer sur la batterie d'automates à votre disposition pour créer une véritable chaîne de montage. À cette fin, vous allez l'aider à construire un tapis roulant. Comme à l'accoutumée, allez chercher des matériaux auprès de l'automate ravitailleur.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_05<tab>The Fetchomatic Mechatoad, infallible as always, produces from its metallic belly the materials required for your work. By your dextrous hands they will be reborn as essential components in...whatever it is that Ronitt's unfathomable genius has conjured up.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez récupéré le nécessaire. Fabriquez maintenant ce dont Ronitt a besoin en haute qualité, et apportez-le-lui.

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_06<tab>After a flurry of activity, Ronitt's latest creation is completed. He has incorporated his existing automaton technology into a mechanized factory, which he claims will increase the speed at which the remaining tanks may be produced. While this does raise the question of how exactly this was a more effective use of time and resources than simply repeating the steps used to create the prototype, it seems the general consensus is to go along with Ronitt's schemes, regardless of how absurd they may be.

The newly constructed automated factory whirs into life and the tanks approach completion. However, the day of reckoning has arrived, and it appears that Ronitt's efforts may have been too little, too late. Ozogg believes there is no other option but to delay the arrival of Chief Xamott to allow Ronitt time to finish his work before final judgment can be passed.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_06<tab>Ronitt est parvenu à automatiser la production des chars, avec à la clef un gain de temps et d'efficacité considérable. Hélas, malgré cette avancée, le compte n'y était toujours pas à quelques minutes du coup d'envoi de la noue-barbe. En désespoir de cause, Ozogg a requis votre aide pour retarder au maximum l'arrivée des doyens, le temps pour Ronitt d'achever son dernier char. Rejoignez-la dans la forêt du Berger égaré.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_07<tab>Ozogg intends to slow the advance of Chief Xamott by placing kegs of nitrobrew, a ludicrously potent alcoholic beverage, in his path. Knowing that dwarves cannot say no to a drink, she hopes that it will incapacitate him for long enough to allow Ronitt to put the finishing touches to the tanks. She tasks you with positioning the barrels, and while it is unclear why she needs your cooperation in the first place, time is of the essence, so you decide not to argue.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_07<tab>Ozogg entend freiner Xamott et Glagg en exploitant le point faible des Nains<var 1D /var>: leur goût immodéré de l'alcool. Ainsi, elle vous a confié des tonneaux d'une bière de son cru, que vous devez à présent déposer sur le trajet des doyens, aux endroits indiqués sur votre carte.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_08<tab>With the kegs of nitrobrew now in place, you must return to Ozogg's hiding place and await the arrival of Chief Xamott. With no idea of exactly when he is supposed to make his appearance, you may be here for some time.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_08<tab>Vous avez mis en place votre piège à ivrognes... Retournez auprès d'Ozogg.

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_09<tab>Chief Xamott arrives as predicted, although he is for some reason accompanied by his archrival, Chief Glagg of the Gogg. Presumably, he has come expecting to see Ronitt fail the challenge and to admonish Ozogg for her involvement. Instead, they find themselves distracted by the allure of a powerful ale, prompting them to collapse into a drunken stupor. Though the limits of their dwarven constitution are sorely tested, they eventually awaken, and Ronitt is still nowhere to be seen. Xamott is ready to declare the wager has come to an end when Ronitt and his column of five tanks trundle onto the scene, much to the relief of you and Ozogg. Xamott congratulates Ronitt on passing the test, which he then uses as an opportunity to regale those in attendance with the tale of the great Watts.

It seems that the Tholl and Gogg were once part of the same tribe, and it was disputes over how best to use Watts's automata that caused the schism between them. His remaining designs were locked away, only for Ronitt to open the safe generations later using a coin given to him as a child by none other than Ozogg. This coming together of Tholl and Gogg may very well mark a turning point in the history of the two tribes, though only time will tell. Xamott and Glagg bid their farewells while the rest of you return to the Anvil.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_09<tab>Le stratagème d'Ozogg a fonctionné comme prévu, et les doyens se sont écroulés, ivres morts. À leur réveil, quelle ne fut leur surprise de voir débarquer... Ronitt et son escadron d'automatanks<var 1D /var>! Bons perdants, ils ont tous deux félicité leurs cadets respectifs, et Xamott s'est fendu d'une révélation fort intéressante. Vous avez ainsi appris que les Tholl et les Gogg formaient jadis un seul et même clan, lequel s'était déchiré autour de la question de l'usage des automates inventés par Watts. Par ailleurs, Ronitt s'est souvenu qu'il s'était servi de deux pièces pour ouvrir la fameuse boîte casse-tête contenant les plans de l'automatank<var 1D /var>: une pièce tholl et la pièce gogg qu'Ozogg lui avait offerte. Ainsi, tout porte à croire que Watts avait pris soin de léguer à ses descendants les clefs de la réunification des deux familles naines... Pour l'heure, laissez ces considérations historiques de côté et retournez au Garage Watts pour faire le bilan avec Ronitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_10<tab>The day is won, but Ronitt is not one to rest on his laurels. He knows full well that it will take more than five tanks to ease the world's woes, so he proposes that production continue. While the workshop is now fully outfitted with an automaton workforce, Ronitt still has need of your crafting talents in manufacturing the next batch of Rolling Tankards.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SEQ_10<tab>Ronitt pense que votre amitié lui porte chance, preuves en sont ses récents succès. À voir si l'avenir continuera de lui donner raison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_000<tab>I've got some bad news and some more bad news. Which do you want first?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... On est mal...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_001<tab>All right, I'll pick. For starters, I hear the chief's been spendin' more and more time checkin' his beard in the mirror...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_001<tab>Je sais pas si t'as vu, mais tous les Nains ont déjà commencé à se lustrer la barbe...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_002<tab>That can only mean one thing: it's almost Beardtide!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_002<tab>Ça veut dire que la noue-barbe est imminente<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_003<tab>What are we gonna do!? At this rate, we'll never make it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_003<tab>Ça craint du boudin... À ce rythme, on n'arrivera jamais à finir les chars à temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_004<tab>...As for the other bit of bad news, some of the workers have turned tail and ran back to the village before they get in any more trouble! Now, there ain't enough people to handle production or bring in raw materials!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_004<tab>Nos gars sont au bout du rouleau, certains nous ont même déjà lâchés. Je peux pas leur en vouloir, mais le fait est qu'on manque de main-d'œuvre, et du coup, de matériaux... Bref, tout fout le camp<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_005<tab>Regitt, Karutt, and the others are already at their breakin' point. I even thought about askin' Ozogg for help, but I can't bloody find her!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_005<tab>Regitt et Karutt se donnent déjà à fond, je peux pas leur en demander plus... Raaah, je sais plus quoi faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_006<tab>Think, Ronitt, think! There must be a way! Maybe a nice, relaxin' stroll will clear my head.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_006<tab>Ç-ça va pas, là, j'ai le souffle court, la sueur qui perle... Je vais prendre l'air vite fait. T'es pas <var 08 E905 ((obligée)) ((obligé)) /var> de me suivre...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_007<tab>Yeah, a quick trip to scenic Dampsole should sort me right out. And whatever you do, don't follow me! Even if you think I might get eaten by hungry beasties, don't follow me. Yes, definitely don't do that.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_007<tab>Une p'tite marche jusqu'à Foulebourbe, ça me fera du bien... T-tu peux me rejoindre si tu veux, mais c'est pas obligé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Ronitt definitely does not want you to follow him to Dampsole.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Ronitt souhaite de toute évidence que vous l'accompagniez à Foulebourbe... Peut-être désire-t-il se confier à vous en privé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_010<tab>Haha! I see you understood my subtle hints!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_010<tab>Oh, bah t'es <var 08 E905 ((venue)) ((venu)) /var> finalement<var 1D /var>? T'étais pas <var 08 E905 ((obligée)) ((obligé)) /var>, hein... même si ça me fait rudement plaisir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_011<tab>You see, I wanted a word with you, away from the others. It's a bit of a touchy subject, and I don't want 'em gettin' discouraged or nothin'.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_011<tab>T'inquiète pas pour moi, ça ira... Les galères peuvent bien s'empiler, j'ai aucune intention de baisser les bras. Si j'abandonne, on aura fait tout ça pour rien, et je pourrai plus vous regarder en face, les autres et toi.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_012<tab>You're good at keepin' secrets, ain't you?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_012<tab>Alors oui, parfois, je suis à deux doigts de craquer... mais on a tous nos moments de faiblesse, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_013<tab>Phew... All right. Truth is, I'm findin' it all a bit much. The pressure, the responsibility. I've always been a loner, and nothin' I ever did made a lot of difference to anyone else.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_013<tab>Je vais pas te mentir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'ai la trouille. La trouille de l'échec. Si encore je bossais tout seul comme avant, ça irait. Mais là, j'ai toute une équipe avec moi, et je veux décevoir personne...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_014<tab>Whereas it seems to me, you're the opposite. By the sounds of it, people are always turnin' to you for help. Don't you ever worry you'll make some sort of horrible mistake and...I dunno, cause the end of the world or somethin'? What's your secret?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_014<tab>Dis... Ça t'est déjà arrivé de ressentir ce genre de pression<var 1D /var>? Comment tu tiens le coup dans ces cas-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_A1_000_001<tab>Just relax and let your talent do the work.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_A1_000_001<tab>J'essaye de me concentrer sur mon objectif.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_A1_000_002<tab>I get by with a little help from my friends.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_A1_000_002<tab>Je trouve du réconfort auprès de mes amis.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_A1_000_003<tab>"Pressure“ is just another word for ”fear“!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_A1_000_003<tab>La pression<var 1D /var>? Connais pas.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_015<tab>Yeah, solvin' problems is what I do best!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_015<tab>Mais ouais, t'as raison<var 1D /var>! Faut pas se prendre la tête, c'est du temps perdu à pas bosser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_016<tab>You're right. I didn't get this far without my friends, and I'm gonna need 'em in the days to come. Watts's Anvil ain't just a place, it's the people who make it what it is!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_016<tab>Oh... C'est vrai que tu dois en avoir, des potes. Moi, je t'ai, toi... et aussi Regitt, Karutt et tous les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_017<tab>So, what you're sayin' is I'm just scared of failure? You're damned right I am! ...But maybe if I concentrate on succeedin' instead of not failin', things should start goin' my way!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_017<tab>Pff, t'as de la veine... C'est pas donné à tout le monde d'avoir un mental d'acier. Va falloir que je prenne exemple sur toi pour devenir un dur, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_018<tab>Thanks, I feel a lot better now. And with the great Watts's blood flowin' in my veins, there ain't nothin' I can't overcome!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_018<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ça va déjà beaucoup mieux grâce à toi. Ouais... Je vais trouver une solution<var 1D /var>! Faut pas oublier que je suis un descendant de Watts. La débrouille, j'ai ça dans le sang<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_019<tab>'Course, I've got Watts's hammer as well, thanks to you findin' it for me!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_019<tab>Tiens, tu te souviens de notre première rencontre<var 1D /var>? Même que j'étais en panique d'avoir paumé mon marteau. Ça date, ça date...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_100_019<tab>Not that I ever use it, mind you. I'm keepin' it safely hidden away until the day comes that I'm skilled enough to wield it myself. This thing? Just a normal, everyday hammer, mate. Nothin' special, but gets the job done.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_100_019<tab>À l'époque, je t'avais dit que je le ressortirais qu'une fois devenu un forgeron légendaire.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_110_019<tab>Point is, it gives me somethin' to look forward to, a reason not to give up. Can't go disappointin' my illustrious ancestor now, can I?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_110_019<tab>En vérité, j'avais aucune idée du temps que ça prendrait pour en arriver là. Au fond de moi, j'étais même pas sûr qu'une vie serait suffisante...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_120_019<tab>Still, honin' my own skills is all well and good, but if I really wanna go down in the history books, I've gotta think big, think beyond what I'm capable of doin' on my own.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_120_019<tab>Mais c'est différent maintenant. Maintenant, j'ai des amis, des gens qui me soutiennent et qui me remotivent quand j'ai un coup de mou<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_130_019<tab>And with friends like you, how can I go wrong?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_130_019<tab>C'est pour ça que dorénavant, il faut que je marche droit... que je coure droit, même<var 1D /var>! À toute berzingue, et sans jamais filer de travers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_020<tab>Right, I'd better get back to the workshop before I run out of steam again. I've found my motivation, now all I need is a plan. Hmm... I wonder what Watts would do at a time like this. A shame his expertise was in automata and not tanks.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_020<tab>Essayons de réfléchir un peu. Qu'est-ce que ferait Watts à notre place<var 1D /var>? Hmm... Plus qu'un expert en chars, c'était avant tout un grand amateur d'automates... Ça voudrait dire que...

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON03900_000_021<tab>(-???-)<beep> Now all I need is a plan...
<beep> Automata...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON03900_000_021<tab>(-???-)(cliquette) COURAGE (grince) RONITT<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_022<tab>The Megasonic Frogboy! And Regitt and Karutt? I thought you two was workin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_022<tab>Gamin tonitruant<var 1D /var>!? Et Regitt, et Karutt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_REGITT_000_023<tab>We just fancied a spot of eavesdropping. Hope you don't mind!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_REGITT_000_023<tab>On voulait que tu saches qu'on est avec toi, et qu'on y croit toujours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_KARUTT_000_024<tab>Yes, we heard everything. I wish you'd s-said something sooner! Y-You don't have to bear the b-burden on your own, you know. Let us sh-share the load!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_KARUTT_000_024<tab>C'est ça. Te bile pas, va. Fais ce que tu sais faire de mieux, on s'occupe du reste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON03900_000_025<tab><beep> Sh-Share the load!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON03900_000_025<tab>ON S'OCCUPE (cliquette) DU RESTE<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_026<tab>Heh. All right, but don't say I didn't warn you!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_026<tab>Les gars, je...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_027<tab>Wait, what was it the Frogboy said just now? I know it's only copyin' what we say, but I feel like it was hintin' at somethin'...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_027<tab>V-vous avez raison<var 1D /var>! Ce que je sais faire de mieux... et ce que Watts ferait à ma place... À bien y réfléchir, je crois que je tiens un truc<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_028<tab>"Now all I need is a plan... Automata...“
...That's it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_028<tab>Il reste plus qu'à se lancer... Les amis, je vais avoir besoin d'un coup de main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_REGITT_000_029<tab>Eh? What is? ...Ah! I see!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_REGITT_000_029<tab>Dacodac<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_KARUTT_000_030<tab>Actually, w-we thought Ozogg might be here, too, but she's nowhere to be seen. Gogg or not, we'll n-need all the pairs of hands we can g-get!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_KARUTT_000_030<tab>Tiens, Ozogg est pas avec vous<var 1D /var>? Je l'ai vue partir du Garage tout à l'heure, je pensais qu'elle allait vous rejoindre.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_KARUTT_000_031<tab>P-Perhaps she's made her way b-back to the workshop by now, and we should pr-probably do likewise.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_KARUTT_000_031<tab>Enfin peu importe, c'est pas mes oignons... Allez, on rentre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_040<tab>Thanks to the Frogboy, the way forward seems clear. Come on, I'll show you what I have in mind!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_040<tab>Hé hé. Grâce à notre con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion, j'ai eu une idée de génie. Viens voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_100_040<tab>I'm gonna use this space to build somethin' that'll speed up production, but I can't do it all on my own.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_100_040<tab>C'est ici que je compte mettre en œuvre mon idée<var 1D /var>! Ce sera un gros chantier, avec pas mal de monde sur le coup.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_041<tab>That reminds me, I thought Ozogg was supposed to be around here somewhere!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_041<tab>En parlant de ça, Ozogg est toujours pas revenue<var 1D /var>? Je me demande bien ce qu'elle fabrique...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_042<tab>(-Ozogg-)Aw! Did you miss me?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_042<tab>(-Voix d'Ozogg-)Ohé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_043<tab>Sorry to keep you waiting. I took the liberty of inviting a few friends of yours.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_043<tab>Désolée d'être partie sans prévenir... Je nous ai ramené du renfort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_000_044<tab>I knew it was only a matter of time before you needed my help. My skills don't come cheap, you know!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_000_044<tab>J'accepte de vous donner un coup de main, mais à charge de revanche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_EUELISS_000_045<tab>Sai-Lewq and I may not be engineers, but we're also not averse to a bit of hard work!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_EUELISS_000_045<tab>Nous avons appris que vous manquiez de main-d'œuvre, alors nous voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SAILEWQ_000_046<tab>Yes, just point out what needs doing and leave the rest to us. Really, considering all you've done for us, Master Ronitt, it would be our pleasure to assist you.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SAILEWQ_000_046<tab>Ce n'est que justice après tout ce que vous avez fait pour Cherpant. Un bon mairrre se doit de toujours payer les dettes de son village<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_047<tab>You traveled all this way just to help me! Well, not you, Lorathia, you only live 'round the corner, but I'm grateful all the same! I'm so happy, I... I...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_047<tab>V-vous tous... vous êtes vraiment trop sympas... (renifle) V-vous allez me faire chialer<var 1D /var>! (pleure)

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_048<tab><sniff> All right! There's plenty of work to be done and not much time to do it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_048<tab>OK... (renifle) C'est la dernière ligne droite, le moment de se serrer les coudes et de tout donner<var 1D /var>! Tous ensemble, tous ensemble<var 1D /var>! Ouais<var 1D /var>! Ouais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_049<tab>As for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, just because all these people have shown up doesn't mean you're off the hook!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_049<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Toi et moi, on va finir ce qu'on a commencé, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_150_049<tab>When I agreed to let you lot use my land, I had no idea the place would end up like <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_150_049<tab>J'admets que votre Garage a de la gueule, comme on dit. C'est autre chose qu'un pauvre terrain vague déserté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_100_049<tab>And to think it would be used to build the very same cannons I designed for the Crystarium. Sometimes I feel that life is a series of bizarre coincidences. Or is that what people call fate?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_100_049<tab>Avec mon bagage technique, je pourrais me rendre utile de mille et une façons ici. Mais j'ai choisi de me restreindre à ma tâche préférée<var 1D /var>: l'assemblage des canons.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_EUELISS_110_049<tab>If there's one thing the people of Wright know about, it's producing alcohol, so imagine our surprise when we learned that Ronitt's tanks use ethanol for fuel. It seems Sai-Lewq and I will be making a greater contribution than we'd thought!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_EUELISS_110_049<tab>Nous allons vous aider à produire du nano-éthanol<var 1D /var>! Si j'ai bien compris, son procédé de fabrication n'est pas très différent de celui de la bière.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SAILEWQ_120_049<tab>I've made plenty of alcohol in my time, but never any strong enough to be used as fuel! Well, not intentionally, that is! Say, this could be a new avenue of business for Wright...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SAILEWQ_120_049<tab>Après ça, on ne pourra pas dire que le maire de Cherpant a peurrr de mettre les mains dans le cambouis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_130_049<tab>I wonder if I'll still be able to carry on engineering when I'm Lorathia's age?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_130_049<tab>J'ai discuté un peu avec madame Lorathia. Franchement, je m'attendais pas à ce qu'une mamie comme elle soit un crack en mécanique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_140_049<tab>Oi! I'll have you know, I've got more than a few good years left in me!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_LORATHIA_140_049<tab>J'ai entendu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_050<tab>Time to put my plan into action. By usin' a load of existin' automaton parts, I'll be able to upgrade the workshop and build the rest of tanks, even with just this small number of us.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_050<tab>Héhé, tu veux connaître ma solution pour tenir les délais<var 1D /var>? Eh bien, c'est simple<var 1D /var>: on va mettre les automates au travail<var 1D /var>! Au travail à la chaîne pour être plus précis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_051<tab>Still, there are a few things that need to be made from scratch, and I've got a whole crate's worth of parts I want you to make. Anythin' less than perfection and it might blow up in our faces, so bring me your finest work, all right?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_051<tab>Et qui dit travail à la chaîne dit...<var 1D /var>? Tapis roulant, bien sûr<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je compte sur toi pour fabriquer les pièces du moteur. Et attention à la qualité, hein. C'est primordial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_052<tab>Still, there are a few things that need to be made from scratch, and I've got a whole crate's worth of parts I want you to make. Anythin' less than perfection and it might blow up in our faces, so bring me your finest work, all right?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_052<tab>Et qui dit travail à la chaîne dit...<var 1D /var>? Tapis roulant, bien sûr<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je compte sur toi pour fabriquer la bande du convoyeur. Et attention à la qualité, hein. Faudrait pas qu'elle craque à la première utilisation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_053<tab>Still, there are a few things that need to be made from scratch, and I've got a whole crate's worth of solutions and chemicals I want you to mix. Anythin' less than perfection and it might blow up in our faces, so bring me your finest work, all right?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_053<tab>Et qui dit travail à la chaîne dit...<var 1D /var>? Tapis roulant, bien sûr<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'aurai besoin d'huile anticorrosive pour lubrifier le moteur, si tu peux m'en fabriquer... Attention à la qualité, hein. C'est primordial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_054<tab>The Fetchomatic Mechatoad'll dish out whatever materials you might need. I'm countin' on you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_054<tab>Je te fais pas l'affront de t'expliquer où trouver les matériaux... Allez, à plus tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_055<tab>If it's materials you're after, don't ask me, I ain't got any! Go and get 'em from the Mechatoad, like usual!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_055<tab>Pas maintenant, je bosse<var 1D /var>! Si c'est des matériaux que tu veux, l'automate ravitailleur est ton ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_056<tab>If it's materials you're after, don't ask me, I ain't got any! Go and get 'em from the Mechatoad, like usual!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_056<tab>Pas maintenant, je bosse<var 1D /var>! Si c'est des matériaux que tu veux, l'automate ravitailleur est ton ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_057<tab>If it's materials you're after, don't ask me, I ain't got any! Go and get 'em from the Mechatoad, like usual!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_057<tab>Pas maintenant, je bosse<var 1D /var>! Si c'est des matériaux que tu veux, l'automate ravitailleur est ton ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_060<tab><beep> <blorp>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_060<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_061<tab><beep> <blorp>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_061<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_062<tab><beep> <blorp>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_062<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_063<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_063<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_064<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_064<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_065<tab><beep> Request for ingredients acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_AUTOMATON_000_065<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_070<tab>Where is it? Lemme see!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_070<tab>Alors, ton boulot, ça avance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_071<tab>Great work, as always! I'd better put this to use right away. There's not a moment to spare!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_071<tab>Génial, à nous les joies de l'automatisation<var 1D /var>! Avec ça, notre vitesse de production va être multipliée par dix. En espérant que ça suffise à nous remettre en selle...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>With the day of reckoning looming ever closer, Ronitt has decided that it would be quicker to construct an entire factory, complete with automaton workers, than build four tanks identical to the one he has already completed, but Ronitt's mind moves in mysterious ways.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>Ronitt parvint à automatiser la production des chars, peu avant l'échéance fixée par les doyens.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>For what Ronitt lacks in effective time management he more than makes up for with sheer stubbornness in the face of overwhelming odds. Perhaps this is what has earned him the respect and loyalty of his ragtag collection of friends?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Autrefois seul, l'adolescent était désormais mieux entouré que jamais. À ses côtés, ses équipiers continuèrent de travailler d'arrache-pied, motivés par un espoir commun.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>And yet, in spite of Ronitt's efforts, time refused to slow, heartless bastard that it is.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>Les heures et les jours s'égrainèrent...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>Then, the fateful day arrived...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>Puis vint enfin le moment tant redouté...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_104<tab>The chief'll be here any moment, and I still have one more tank to finish!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_104<tab>Raah, la poisse<var 1D /var>! Les viocs vont rappliquer d'un moment à l'autre, et il nous manque encore un char<var 1D /var>! Juste UN, quoi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_105<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have an idea! Come with me!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_105<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu viens avec moi<var 1D /var>? Je crois que j'ai un plan<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_106<tab>We'll try to buy you some time. You get that last tank completed, no matter what it takes!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_106<tab>On va essayer de gagner du temps. Profites-en pour finir le dernier char, coûte que coûte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_110<tab>Phew! I'm not used to all this running about! Here, take this.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_110<tab>(halète) Pas de doyens (halète) en vue... On est bons<var 1D /var>! Tiens, voilà mon arme secrète, celle que j'avais enterrée ici en prévision de ce moment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_111<tab>It's nitrobrew, an alcoholic beverage that doubles as paint stripper, and it's strong enough to knock out a bison. If we leave these kegs in the road, Xamott is bound to help himself to a few swigs.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_111<tab>C'est des tonneaux de Nain-soutenable, une bière dont j'ai moi-même élaboré la recette. Extraforte et extracorsée, comme les doyens aiment<var 1D /var>! Avec ça, ils vont finir ronds comme une queue de pelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_112<tab>Don't give me that look! <var 08 E4E94804 ((You know full well we dwarves can't say no to a drink!)) ((You clearly don't know how a dwarf's mind works!)) /var>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_112<tab>Ils tomberont pas dans le panneau, tu dis<var 1D /var>? Alors là, c'est mal connaître les Nains<var 1D /var>! Quand bien même ils se douteraient de quelque chose, je t'assure qu'ils pourront pas résister à l'appel de la biture<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_113<tab>Look, there isn't much time, and this is the best I could come up with! Just put them over there and let dwarven nature take its course.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_113<tab>Grâce à mon repérage de l'autre fois, je sais exactement où déposer les tonneaux pour attirer leur attention. Je vais t'indiquer les emplacements et te laisser t'en charger, le temps que mon point de côté disparaisse...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_114<tab>Hurry up! It'll all be for naught if he spots you!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_114<tab>J'ai marqué sur ta carte où il faut déposer les tonneaux. Je t'aurais bien <var 08 E905 ((accompagnée)) ((accompagné)) /var>, mais mon point de côté est toujours pas passé...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_120<tab>That should do it.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_120<tab>Les tonneaux sont en place<var 1D /var>? Excellent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_121<tab>And now, we wait...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_121<tab>Nos deux soiffards ont qu'à bien se tenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_150<tab>What!? He's already here! And why is Chief Glagg with him!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_150<tab>V-vingt dieux, les doyens arrivent déjà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_151<tab>But more importantly, did the nitrobrew do its job?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_151<tab>Ils ont pas sauté la case picole, quand même<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_152<tab>It musht be...my lucky day! <hic> And beshides...be a shame to let all that <hic> grog go to waste...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_152<tab>Qui l'eût cru... hips... qu'on trouverait des barriques entières de bibine au beau milieu de la forêt... hips<var 1D /var>! Ça doit être notre jour de chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_153<tab>For once, I...<hic>...agree with you... You old shwine... <hic>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_153<tab>Et de la bonne, en plus<var 1D /var>! Elle m'est montée à la tête diiiirect<var 1D /var>! Euh là...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_154<tab>(-Xamott and Glagg-)...Urp...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_154<tab>(-Xamott et Glagg-)...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_155<tab><snore> ...Ah, shaddup...hob's bollocksh... <snore>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_155<tab>(ronfle) (ronfle)

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_156<tab>What...did you...shay? <snore>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_156<tab>(ronfle) (ronfle)

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_157<tab>Come on, Ronitt! They won't stay like this forever!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_157<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'il fabrique, cet imbécile de Ronitt<var 1D /var>!? S'il se magne pas, les doyens vont finir par se réveiller<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_158<tab>Hmm? What happened...?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_158<tab>Mgnnn... Gné<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_159<tab>Was I...asleep?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_159<tab>(baille) Ça fait du bien, une bonne petite sieste<var 1D /var>! Mais, hum... qu'est-ce que je fous là, moi, déjà<var 1D /var>?

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_160<tab>Ungh... My head feels like it's been stepped on by a Talos... Booze must've been involved...
Ah! Aren't there supposed to be tanks around here somewhere?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_160<tab>(baille) Ah, ça me revient<var 1D /var>! Les cinq chars<var 1D /var>! Où c'est qu'ils sont<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_161<tab>Gah! Too little, too late!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_161<tab>Et zut... Si près du but<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_162<tab>Yes, I notice a distinct lack of tanks. I declare this contest well and truly─
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_162<tab>Bah alors, les minus<var 1D /var>? La montagne était trop haute pour vous<var 1D /var>? Comme c'est dommage...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_163<tab>Not so fast!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_163<tab>Ohééé<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_164<tab>The hills are alive with the sound of...TANKS!♪
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_164<tab>On vous a pas trop fait attendre, j'espère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_165<tab>Ronitt!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_165<tab>Ronitt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_166<tab>What...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_166<tab>Char par exemple<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_167<tab>...the bloody hells...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_167<tab>Charrive pas à y croire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_168<tab>The Rollin' Tankards, at your service!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_168<tab>Hé hé... Alors, Doyen Xamott, ça vous en bouche un coin, hein<var 1D /var>? Je vous avais bien dit que vous alliez manger votre casque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_170<tab>What's wrong with you two? Aren't you gonna congratulate me on my hard-earned victory?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_170<tab>Pfiou, j'ai bien cru qu'on n'y arriverait jamais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_171<tab>No, we're bloody well not! Have you any idea what you've put us through!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_171<tab>À qui le dis-tu<var 1D /var>!? J'ai eu des sueurs froides à cause de toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_REGITT_000_172<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_REGITT_000_172<tab>

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_100_172<tab>Did I say “<var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> hard-earned victory”? Of course, what I meant to say was “<var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> hard-earned victory”! Yes, yes! A slip of the tongue, that's all! I-Is...that any better?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_100_172<tab>Mais tu t'es pas débinée pour autant<var 1D /var>! Toi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> et tous nos amis, vous avez rien lâché jusqu'au bout. C'est grâce à vous qu'on a pu tenir les délais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_173<tab>Well, Ronitt. You did it, fair and square. No underhanded, dirty tricks. At least none that I'm aware of.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_173<tab>C'est un sacré tour de force que vous avez accompli là. Pour vous dire, ça m'a tellement soufflé que j'ai dessoûlé d'un coup<var 1D /var>! Bien joué les jeunes. Entre ça et la cuite qu'on s'est prise avec Glagg, on n'a pas perdu notre journée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_174<tab>Ozogg! Though I have yet to decide your punishment for consortin' with Tholls, I will say this: you have demonstrated the superiority of Gogg engineerin', without which, those tanks would never have seen the light of day!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_174<tab>Ozogg<var 1D /var>! Sache que le clan ne fermera pas les yeux sur ta trahison<var 1D /var>!
... Ceci étant, tu as fini par faire honneur à notre réputation. Pour ça, je te félicite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_175<tab>Listen, Chief. I didn't do this because I'm a Gogg, I did this because I'm a member of Watts's Anvil, so stick that in your pipe and smoke it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_175<tab>Merci Doyen, mais vous pouvez garder vos compliments. Ce défi, je l'ai pas relevé pour les Gogg, mais pour mes amis... et surtout pour moi-même.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_176<tab>All this talk of Tholl and Gogg has reminded me of somethin' important.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_176<tab>Tant qu'on y est... Je voudrais vous révéler un secret à propos de nos tribus. Un secret que seuls les doyens connaissent... Voyez ça comme une récompense pour avoir gagné votre pari.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_177<tab>We don't often talk about this, but when I were a lad, my chief once told me that Tholl and Gogg were once part of a single tribe.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_177<tab>Voilà. Il y a longtemps, très longtemps, les Tholl et les Gogg ne formaient qu'un seul et unique clan.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_178<tab>And into that one tribe was born a boy. His name...was Watts. He was blessed with curiosity and imagination in abundance, and grew up to become the greatest inventor our kind has ever known.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_178<tab>Une grande famille de Nains, au sein de laquelle naquit un jour un garçon pas comme les autres<var 1D /var>; un véritable génie qu'on surnommera plus tard “le forgeron légendaire”. Il s'appelait Watts.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_179<tab>But sadly, the automata that he created caused a rift in our people. Some wanted to use them as workers, while others saw them as tools of war.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_179<tab>C'est à lui et à son imagination fertile que nous devons les premiers automates polyvalents. Seulement, à l'époque, son invention créa la discorde. Certains y voyaient un nouvel outil de travail, d'autres un redoutable moyen de défense.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_180<tab>Pah! And we all know how that ended. The limp-bearded Tholls, content to dig their holes and till their soil, and the mighty Goggs crushing their enemies and sowing the fields with their blood! Glory to Komra!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_180<tab>Chez nous, les Gogg, on pense que la technologie doit être au service de la protection du clan. C'était le credo de nos ancêtres lorsqu'ils ont fait sécession, et c'est toujours le nôtre aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_181<tab>A pox on Komra!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_181<tab>La ferme, barbe rêche<var 1D /var>! C'est moi qui raconte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_182<tab>A pox!? Is that the worst you Tholls can muster!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_182<tab>Je l'ouvre si j'veux, face de coton<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_183<tab>Stop squabblin', the pair of you! I wanna hear the rest of the story!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_183<tab>Du calme<var 1D /var>! J'ai une question. Et Watts alors, il en pensait quoi de tout ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_184<tab>Ah, yes, as I was saying... Watts was beside himself to think that his beloved inventions could lead to so much strife. He locked away the rest of his designs, so that they could never bring harm to his fellow dwarves.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_184<tab>Watts était évidemment affligé de voir la grande famille des Nains se déchirer à cause de son invention. À tel point qu'il abandonna tous ses travaux en cours, et cacha ses croquis dans une boîte verrouillée par un mécanisme connu de lui seul.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_185<tab>And those designs included the tank... It all makes sense now. No wonder he didn't want no one findin' 'em. But if I hadn't opened that safe, somebody else would've eventually.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_185<tab>La boîte casse-tête<var 1D /var>! Mais c'est bizarre d'avoir pris cette peine, alors qu'il aurait simplement pu brûler ses dessins... En plus, une boîte mystère, ça attise la curiosité...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_186<tab>How did you open it, anyway? It was locked tight!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_186<tab>Justement... Ronitt, te souviens-tu de la façon exacte dont tu t'y es pris pour défaire le verrou<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_187<tab>Erm... Well, it was a long time ago, so I ain't quite sure, but I remember I used a coin. One given to me by a Gogg, I think.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_187<tab>Houla... Alors, si je dis pas de bêtises, je me suis servi d'une pièce tholl, et aussi... Ah oui<var 1D /var>! De la pièce que m'avait offerte cette fille.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_188<tab>Ah! That coin! It's the one I gave you!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_OZOGG_000_188<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! La pièce gogg<var 1D /var>! C'est moi qui te l'ai filée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_189<tab>Eh!? You mean you're that Gogg girl, from all those years ago!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_189<tab>Qu-quooooi<var 1D /var>!? La fille avec qui j'ai passé un aprèm entier à ramasser de la ferraille, c'était toi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_190<tab>Maybe this is how Watts planned it all along... His descendants, workin' side by side.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_190<tab>Je m'en doutais. Watts a confié ses espoirs aux générations futures... à vous qui êtes ses héritiers de sang<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_191<tab>It weren't the technology what were at fault. It was us dwarves and our bickerin' what caused us to live apart as Tholl and Gogg. But now, one of Watts's ideas might build a bridge between us...
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_191<tab>Écoutez-moi bien, tous les deux. Il n'y a pas de mauvaise invention, seulement des mauvaises intentions. Un char qui n'aurait rien amené de bon du temps de Watts peut par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment devenir, bien des années plus tard, la clef de la réconcil...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_192<tab>Oh, shut up, you daft sod! You think this is all it takes to wash away generations of bad blood!? Pah! ...But on the other hand, we Goggs admire Watts just as much as you Tholls. If you're right─which would be a first─it's worth some thought.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_192<tab>T-tout de suite les grands mots<var 1D /var>! Désolé, mais je me sens pas prêt à mélanger les barbes et les couvre-chefs<var 1D /var>! Même si je ferme la porte à rien...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_193<tab>Trouble is, it all seems a little <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> convenient. The coin, the chance reunion, all the other coincidences, and there are probably a load more I don't even know about!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_GLAGG_000_193<tab>Surtout, je me demande pourquoi maintenant... D'accord, ces chars sont un petit miracle, mais de là à y voir un signe du destin...

source:
TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_194<tab>“Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.”
You see, all the coincidences in the world won't do you no good if you ain't got the gumption to make the most of 'em. Somethin' Ronitt and Ozogg have in spades.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_194<tab>Moi, cette idée me plaît bien...

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_195<tab>Right, that's enough blatherin' out of me. I'm off for a pint at the Crystarium on my way home.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_000_195<tab>Sur ce, je vais aller m'en jeter un dernier à Cristarium avant de rentrer au bercail.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_100_195<tab>And if you two think this is the end, think again! Five tanks is just the start. It'll take more'n that to solve the world's troubles!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_XAMOTT_100_195<tab>La suite va pas être de tout repos, les jeunes, alors accrochez-vous, et faites la fierté du peuple nain<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_196<tab>All right, I hear you. Now, bugger off and let us get on with it.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_196<tab>Pas la peine de me le dire deux fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_197<tab>That's funny... I thought those two were enemies. Probably got more in common than they realize. Anyway, it's time we got back to the Anvil!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_197<tab>Allez, on se rentre, nous aussi. On a une révolution à mener<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_200<tab>So you an' Ozogg bought me some time, did you? Should've bought a bit more by the sounds of it!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_200<tab>Ozogg m'a raconté pour les tonneaux de bière. Merci, vous avez assuré sur toute la ligne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_201<tab>Heh, just jokin'. If it weren't for you two, I'd never have made it. I s'pose that's what Watts's Anvil is all about: you lot workin' your arses off to make me look good. Somethin' like that, anyway.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_201<tab>Je sais pas si t'as remarqué, mais depuis qu'on est potes, j'enchaîne les succès<var 1D /var>: le Garage, les automatanks... Faut croire que t'es mon porte-bonheur sur pattes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_202<tab>But it's like the chief said, a measly five tanks ain't gonna right the world's wrongs. So, I reckon...five hundred ought to do it! We'd better get back to work, an' no slackin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_RONITT_000_202<tab>Je sais que j'ai encore du chemin pour rejoindre Watts au panthéon des bricoleurs. Mais avec toute l'équipe qui me tire vers le haut, c'est presque comme si c'était déjà fait, hé hé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with Watts's Anvil.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Votre réputation auprès des Nains du Garage Watts est passée à “Assermenté”.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the dwarf tribal daily quests.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>Vous bénéficiez désormais d'un bonus de points d'expérience plus important lorsque vous finissez une quête quotidienne de cette tribu.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from Mizutt.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>En outre, Mizutt vous propose maintenant les objets correspondant au rang “Assermenté”. Faites-en bon usage au cours de vos aventures<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>Les objets de qualité normale fabriqués au cours de cette quête n'ayant aucune utilité et ne pouvant être vendus, il est recommandé de les jeter.

source: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA005_03900_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>
